publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2381 Jack McConnell: Good Luck to Team GB and the Beijing Olympics—That the Parliament welcomes the opening of the 2008 Olympiad in Beijing and sends good luck to Team GB; congratulates the 31 Scots on Team GB for the Olympics and the 16 Scots on Team GB for the Paralympics and wishes them well; celebrates the achievements of all the athletes who will compete for Team GB; looks forward to the medals and the personal bests which will inspire others in the future, and welcomes the opportunity provided by the Olympic Games to further build links between the people of China and the rest of the world.

S3M-2381 Good Luck to Team GB and the Beijing Olympics (lodged on 8 August 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*, Bill Butler*, David McLetchie*, Iain Gray*, Bob Doris*, Cathy Peattie*, Jackie Baillie*, Jamie McGrigor*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Murdo Fraser*, Karen Gillon*, Pauline McNeill*, Sarah Boyack*, John Park*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Claire Baker*, Lewis Macdonald*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Ross Finnie*, Jackson Carlaw*, John Lamont*, Rhona Brankin*, Mike Pringle*, Ken Macintosh*, George Foulkes*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Robert Brown*, Michael McMahon*, Jamie Hepburn*, Jim Tolson*, James Kelly*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-2381Good Luck to Team GB and the Beijing Olympics (lodged on 8 August 2008) Michael Matheson*, Jamie Stone*
S3M-2381 Good Luck to Team GB and the Beijing Olympics (lodged on 8 August 2008) Robin Harper*
S3M-2381 Good Luck to Team GB and the Beijing Olympics (lodged on 8 August 2008) Tom McCabe*
